// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper2[16] = {
	78, 12,
	73, 2,
	58, 0,
	5, 5,
	0, 11,
	5, 20,
	67, 24,
	77, 17
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper2[16] = {
	0.975000f, 0.461538f,
	0.912500f, 0.076923f,
	0.725000f, 0.000000f,
	0.062500f, 0.192308f,
	0.000000f, 0.423077f,
	0.062500f, 0.769231f,
	0.837500f, 0.923077f,
